name: Sizzling Barrage
originalText: Sizzling Barrage deals 4 damage to target creature that blocked this turn.

rulings.text: Sizzling Barrage can target a creature that’s currently blocking or one that blocked earlier in the turn and is no longer blocking.
Destroying a blocking creature doesn’t cause the creature it was blocking to become unblocked.
